title: Sun Transit in the 1st House for Virgo Ascendant
summary: The Sun transiting the first house strengthens self-awareness, vitality, and leadership expression for Virgo ascendants. Confidence rises, decisions become clearer, and personal identity takes center stage. While visibility improves, there is a tendency to appear authoritative or overly self-critical. This phase favors disciplined self-improvement, health focus, and clear personal goals. When humility balances confidence, the Sun enhances presence, credibility, and purposeful action.

sections.heading: Career
points: Good phase to initiate personal projects

closing: This transit spotlights the self. With disciplined confidence and humility, the Sun empowers purposeful growth.
